mapper.select: select g.goods_code goodsCode, g.goods_Name goodsName, g.book_id bookId, g.goods_notes goodsNotes, g.price price, g.image goodsImage, g.writer writer, g.goods_notes goodsNotes, s.stores_name storesName, s.stores_address storesAddress from t_goods g,t_stores s where g.goods_code = #{goodsCode} and s.stores_invite_code = (SELECT invite_code FROM t_user WHERE user_code = #{userId})
select level_code levelCode, level_name levelName from t_goodslevel where is_deleted = 0

select a.level_code levelCode, a.level_name levelName, b.goods_code goodsCode, b.goods_name goodsName, b.image goodsImage, b.price price from t_goodslevel a left join t_goods b on a.level_code = b.secondlevel_code where a.is_parent = 1 and a.is_deleted = 0 and a.parent_level_code = #{parentLevelCode} and b.goods_status = 0

select a.user_code userCode, a.judge_content judgeContent, a.judge_Level judgeLevel, a.create_time judgeTime, b.image_path imagePath from t_sys_judge a left join t_sys_judge_image b on a.judge_code = b.judge_code where a.goods_code = #{goodsCode}
and a.judge_goods_level = #{judgeGoodsLevel}
